original_text: Immediately, Sapphira fell down in front of Peter and she died. Then the young men came into the room. They saw that Sapphira was dead. So they carried her outside and they buried her body next to her husband.
korean_text: 곧 그가 베드로의 발 앞에 엎드러져 혼이 떠나는지라 젊은 사람들이 들어와 죽은 것을 보고 메어다가 그의 남편 곁에 장사하니

sentences.original_text: Immediately, Sapphira fell down in front of Peter
Then the young men came into the room
They saw that Sapphira was dead
and they buried her body next to her husband
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그녀의 몸을 남편 옆에 묻었습니다
